net.alomax.timedom.fp6

Class USGSFP6Extension

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alomax.timedom.TimeDomainProcess
      • net.alomax.timedom.BasicPicker
        • net.alomax.timedom.fp6.FilterPicker6
          • net.alomax.timedom.fp6.USGSFP6Extension

  • public final class USGSFP6Extension
extends FilterPicker6
    this is a subclass of FilterPicker6 that tracks some implementation details needed at the USGS

    • Constructor Detail

      • USGSFP6Extension

        public USGSFP6Extension(java.lang.String localeText,
                        java.lang.String ch,
                        EdgeThread parent,
                        java.lang.String title,
                        FilterPicker6_BandParameters[] bandParam,
                        double longTermWindow,
                        double threshold1,
                        double threshold2,
                        double tUpEvent,
                        double tUpEventMin,
                        int direction)
                 throws TimeDomainException
        Constructs a new FilterPicker6_old object setting filter bands automatically based on filterWindow and sample interval of data
        Parameters:
        localeText - locale for information, warning and error messages
        ch - The NSCL channel name
        parent - The parent EdgeThread to use for logging
        title - The title of the configuration template
        bandParam - An array of BandParameter to set the bands
        longTermWindow - long term window factor
        threshold1 - threshold to trigger a pick event
        threshold2 - threshold to declare a pick
        tUpEvent - maximum time window after trigger for declaring a pick
        tUpEventMin - minimum time window after trigger for declaring a pick
        direction - The direction per the BasicPicker
        Throws:
        TimeDomainException

    • Method Detail

      • isTriggered

        public boolean[] isTriggered(FilterPicker6PickData pickData,
                             java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
        Given a pick, return the array for which bands were triggered and optionally a StringBuilder with detail
        Parameters:
        pickData - The pick returned from the FilterPicker6
        sb - If null, nothing, if not null, this is cleared and a line per pick is added.
        Returns:
        Array of booleans, one for each frequency band, set true if the DF was big enough.

      • getBandCorners

        public double[] getBandCorners(int nband,
                               double[] band)
        for a given band index, return the 1/2 power frequencies as an array of 2 with flow and fhigh in 0 and 1
        Parameters:
        nband - The band index
        band - User array of 2 double to put answer in.
        Returns:
        two element array with flow and fhigh at the 1/2 power points

        Parameters:
